Control Name: 1.7.9 Zone to Zone disaster recovery is used for virtual machines.
Control Statement: Replicate, failover and failback your business-critical virtual machines within the same region with zones. Ideal for those that have complicated networking infrastructure and want to avoid the cost and complexity of recreating it in a secondary region.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.7 How do you manage compute costs for this workload?
